title: View on the River Wye, Looking towards Chepstow
medium: watercolor, gouache, and touches of oil paint (?) over graphite with scraping out, heightened with varnish and/or gum arabic, on wove paper
dimensions:
Overall: 30.7 x 64 cm (12 1/16 x 25 3/16 in.)
overall (mat size): 50.8 x 86.4 cm (20 x 34 in.)
creditline: Gift of The Circle of the National Gallery of Art, in Honor of the 50th Anniversary of the National Gallery of Art
